name: Shelter Program
description: - Safe, confidential shelter with bed capacity of 15-18 people, including children - Emergency services (food, clothing, and ongoing health services) - Multilingual support and culturally competent services
fullDescription: - Safe, confidential shelter with bed capacity of 15-18 people, including children - Emergency services (food, clothing, and ongoing health services) - Multilingual support and culturally competent services
whatTheyOffer: Asian Women's Shelter (AWS) serves all women survivors of domestic violence and human trafficking and their families by providing the following: - Safe, confidential shelter with bed capacity of 15-18 people, including children - Emergency services (food, clothing and ongoing health services) - Multilingual support and culturally competent services - Intensive case management - Individual and group support - Coordination of support services (legal advocacy and assistance, transportation, counsel
howToGetIt: How to Apply: - Call by phone or send an email at info@sfaws.org
requirements: Women, children and transgender survivors of domestic violence and human trafficking EDITED
